prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rockingham County Circuit Court Receipts, Collection #3086, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Deposited by Scott Suter for the Harrisonburg-Rockingham Historical Society in Jan. 1996.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection contains receipts from Clerk of the Circuit Court, Rockingham County, VA, for payment of "order and continuance" and other court fees, 1875-1882.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: These documents came in alphabetically-designated pockets in a cloth apron designed for the purpose. Original order has been retained.
